title: [Epic] Exercise Pro Edition Runbook End-to-End
description:
Exercise the Pro edition runbook (PRO_README.md) end-to-end: boot the stack with Postgres, stand up at least two tenants, map guilds, and verify billing + API flows in a SaaS-like environment before enabling it for customers.

Source: MULTITENANT_PLAN.md section 8

title: Verify Postgres migrations with SOUNDBORED_EDITION=pro
description:
Postgres migrations succeed on a fresh database with SOUNDBORED_EDITION=pro.

Source: PRO_README.md section 10

title: Verify subdomain routing and tenant isolation
description:
Subdomain routing serves tenant-specific data (create a second tenant and confirm isolation).

Source: PRO_README.md section 10

title: Verify Discord guild events persist to correct tenant
description:
Discord guild events persist plays under the mapped tenant.

Source: PRO_README.md section 10

title: Verify settings page shows plan usage and billing links
description:
/settings shows plan usage, upgrade link, and (optionally) manage portal URL.

Source: PRO_README.md section 10

title: Verify billing webhook updates tenant
description:
Billing webhook updates a tenant when replaying a fixture payload.

Source: PRO_README.md section 10

title: Verify API tokens are tenant-scoped
description:
API tokens (/settings > API Tokens) operate per tenant and cannot access another tenant's sounds.

Source: PRO_README.md section 10
